other_tests.findings: Persistent mural thickening of a 10 cm segment of sigmoid colon with regional and adjacent diverticula in the left lower quadrant, associated with exuberant fat stranding. An ill-defined confluent area of hypoattenuation consistent with a phlegmon or evolving abscess measuring 5 x 6 cm.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Significantly increased in size since four days ago, but has yet to organize fully.
